title: BitcoinBarrel
author: BitcoinBarrel
content: Quotesuccess is the product of daily habits—not once-in-a-lifetime transformations-James ClearPost your favorite quotes and motivational sayings below

comments.author: mich
comments.body: "Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.", Winston S. Churchill“If you are working on something that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.”, Steve Jobs“I’m a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.”, Thomas Jefferson

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Original source unknown but I like this one.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: I really love one of Martin Luther King Jr.'s Quotes/provers where he said "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter."that's my best proverb

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: "If you feel lost and want to give up, just remember why did you start." This quote has supported me for several difficult years.

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: "It's OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket. Elon Musk

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: He that walketh with wise men shall be wise; but a companion of fools shall be destroyed. Walk with the wise and become wise; associate yourself with fools and become foolish. Proverbs 13:20. When you fail to plan, you’ve already planned to fail.

comments.author: White pawn
comments.body: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you. The earth would be a much better place if we all abide by that saying.

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: Quote"I want to sing like the birds sing, not worrying about who hears or what they think."- RumiI like Rumi's sentence above, every day we get into trouble in life, sometimes not caring about what other people say makes us less stressed.Quote“Do not train a child to learn by force or harshness; but direct them to it by what amuses their minds, so that you may be better able to discover with accuracy the peculiar bent of the genius of each.”- PlatoThis sentence from Plato is also very extraordinary in my life, I applied it to my 2 children and it is proven that every child has their own expertise, if we force what we want on them, it will cut off the natural talent they have. I support whatever my child wants, as long as it's positive.

comments.author: Inwestour
comments.body: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent (Norman R. Augustine)Genius is one percent inspiration, and ninety-nine percent perspiration (Thomas Edison)Motivated and purposeful people are full of energy, they are able to dream and achieve their own, even if they are not gifted with great opportunities.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.Charles R. SwindollAlways do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.Og MandinoEither you run the day or the day runs you.Jim Rohn

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Success comes to those who become success conscious. Failure comes to those who indifferently allow themselves to become failure conscious.  By : Napoleon HillLearning gives creativity, Creativity leads to thinking, Thinking provides knowledge, Knowledge makes you great.  By : Abdul Kalam

comments.author: briandean
comments.body: "Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts." — Winston S. Churchill

comments.author: mich
comments.body: “He that can have patience can have what he will.”, Winston S. Churchill“Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.”, Albert Einstein“We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.”, Aristotle“For the great doesn’t happen through impulse alone, and is a succession of little things that are brought together.”, Vincent van Gogh

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: If I had eight hours to chop down a tree, I'd spend six hours sharpening my axe.   By : Abraham LincolnAction is the foundational key to all success.  By : Pablo PicassoIf you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.  By : Martin Luther King

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. -Walt DisneyLife is what happens when you're busy making other plans. -John LennonDon't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant. -Robert Louis StevensonIt is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light. -Aristotlehttps://blog.hubspot.com/sales/famous-quotes

comments.author: GigaBit
comments.body: “Success usually comes to those who are too busy looking for it.” — Henry David Thoreau“I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.” —Estée LauderThe word success refers to-S- See your goalU- Understand the obstacles C- Create a positive mental picture C- Clear your mind of self doubt E- Embrace the challenge S- Stay on track S- Show the world you can do it

comments.author: Sticks and stones
comments.body: What a wonderful thought it is that some of the best days of our lives haven’t even happened yet.Anne Frank

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Sir, my concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right.   By : Abraham LincolnImagination is more important than knowledge.   By : Albert EinsteinI hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.  By : ConfuciusWe can live without religion and meditation, but we cannot survive without human affection.  By : Dalai LamaNever put off until tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.  By : Mark TwainNothing in the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.  By : Martin Luther King
